direction.raw_text: Some stuff will take a long time. I've been protecting you until now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think I don't know stuff you don't know? I am vor by birth. The stars are a birthmark for me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, Kirill. Kirill is about to fly into a rage but Nikolai gets to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where the fuck are you going? We've got to celebrate. Help me with these bottles. (CONTINUED) PINK Revision    -   11/12/06                            77. 65   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your dad don't need the bottles any more. As Nikolai departs Kirill calls after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! We're still partners, right? Thunder and lightning! Nikolai climbs the steps. Kirill is left to swig his brandy and stare into the darkness. He wipes his eyes angrily with his sleeve. 66   EXT. TRANS-SIBERIAN RESTAURANT. TWO DAYS LATER - NIGHT         66 Sweet Russian choral music covers the next four scenes. The street outside the restaurant is now flooding with rain. A Daimler and a Bentley are already parked. A large SUV pulls up and a hard-looking Russian man in his sixties (VALERY) is ushered from the car by bodyguards in suits and shades. He is greeted by a darker-looking man in his fifties (THE GYPSY) who has a fur coat around his shoulders. Semyon is waiting on the doorstep, dressed in a fine dark suit. 67   INT. TRANS-SIBERIAN RESTAURANT - NIGHT                         67 The curtains are drawn against the rainy light. The Gypsy, Valery, Semyon and TWO OTHER RUSSIAN MEN are sitting in a line behind a restaurant table, like a judging panel. After a moment Nikolai enters, dressed in suit and tie for the biggest interview of his life. The vory behind the table greet him. Then Nikolai takes off his jacket and removes his tie. He then takes off his shirt, to reveal that his upper body is decorated with elaborate tattoos (details to follow). He carefully places his shirt over the chair then sits down. The panel of the vory study his body, the Gypsy pushing a candle across the table to better illuminate the detail of the tattoos. Only after the men have studied the tattoos does the interview begin. (CONTINUED) WHITE Revision       -   9/12/06                                78. 67   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The following dialogue should not be translated, and can be cut around to suggest a long and grueling interview.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can see that you were in prison in Siberia. And that you were a thief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My father was a government worker. He fixed the cars of officials. I began by selling the spare parts when I was fifteen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have no forced tattoos?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: None.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were not co-operative?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I spent two years in the punishment block.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You went through the Crosses in St. Petersburg?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was in solitary confinement fifteen times. I was called 'The Stump' because they couldn't shift me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your father was a bitch and a weak fucker for working with the Government, that's right isn't it? Nikolai flickers a little.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right. My father means nothing to me. My Mother....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have no mother.      She was a whore anyway. (CONTINUED) PINK Revision    -   11/12/06                           79. 67   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. I have no mother and no father. There is only the code, the vory v zakone code which I have always followed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is why there is an empty place above your heart. Where the stars will go. And why there is an empty place on your knees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am dead already. I died when I was fifteen. Now I live in the zone all the time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have never worked for the government? Any government?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have lived off Albanians and Georgians. I steal from them within the law. The questions and answers are delivered with great solemnity, making the ceremony feel almost religious. Candles burn, the men all sip water. Semyon is silent throughout but listens attentively. Towards the end of the interview there is the ghost of a smile on the Gypsy's face and this pleases Semyon. 68   EXT. TRANS-SIBERIAN RESTAURANT. REAR ENTRANCE - NIGHT         68 A wizened old Russian man (THE TATTOOIST) arrives at the kitchen door, carrying a battered leather case. The kitchen door is opened as he arrives and Semyon greets him. 69   INT. TRANS-SIBERIAN RESTAURANT - NIGHT                        69 The choral music continues as we see the old man opening his case and pulling out tattooing equipment. (CONTINUED) PINK Revision    -   11/12/06                            80. 69   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nikolai is sitting in a banquette at the back, wearing only his underpants. We circle Nikolai as the tattooist begins to work on his knees, preparing Nikolai's knee caps for the tattoos. The needle bites at Nikolai's skin as the old tattooist wipes away the blood. Then we see the needle working on the empty spaces above Nikolai's heart, tattooing the star symbol. Nikolai now has a star tattoo on each knee and two eight- pointed stars on his chest. He is now a member of the vory v zakone. 70   INT. HELEN'S HOUSE. ANNA'S BEDROOM - MORNING                   70 Anna is lying awake, her curtains drawn against the daylight. Helen knocks and enters with a cup of tea, just as in the opening scenes. Anna sits up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have you slept at all? Anna doesn't answer.    Helen looks anxious as she peeks out of the curtains.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I tried to get hold of Stepan for you. A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's usually either at home or at his sisters. But she hasn't heard from him at all. Helen is trying to hide her anxiety but Anna sees it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He did spit in that horrible man's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think the driver would do anything to Stepan. (CONTINUED) PINK Revision    -   11/12/06                             81. 70   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Helen knows Anna well, senses some flicker of attraction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you know what he would do? A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You haven't spoken to him since, have you? Anna doesn't answer and Helen's anger sparks... She leaves and slams the door. 71   EXT. TURKISH BATHS - DAY                                        71 We are in St. Pancras, North London. More rain. Ozim is waiting nervously, blowing into his hands against the cold. The Turkish bath building is a Victorian red-brick edifice. Nikolai pulls up in his Mercedes. 72   INT. TURKISH BATHS. CHANGING ROOM - DAY                         72 Ozim and Nikolai are undressing. The place is deserted apart from an OLD TURKISH BATH-HOUSE ATTENDANT who is distributing towels. Ozim is unbuttoning his shirt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Semyon recommends these places for business meetings because you can see what tattoos a man has. Nikolai is pulling off his shirt and Ozim reacts to the sight of the fresh eight-pointed star tattoos. Ozim chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. We have a lot to get through. Let's cook. Ozim disappears into a steam room, naked. Nikolai watches him go, a private agenda bubbling beneath the surface. 73   OMITTED                                                         73 PINK Revision   -   11/12/06                             82. 74   INT. TURKISH BATHS. STEAM ROOM - DAY                           74 Ozim and Nikolai sit side by side, sweating.    There is no one else in the steam room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Our lines to Kabul get broken every two or three weeks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How come?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Americans. Fucking NATO. (pause) Valery Nabokov imports flowers and television sets into this country. The television sets are one in ten. That means one in ten have cargo inside them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where do they dock? Ozim grins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will tell you when I return from the bathroom. Ozim chuckles as he leaves in a swirl of steam. Nikolai leans back against the cold wall, his tattoo almost the only visible thing through the steam. 75   INT. TURKISH BATHS. CHANGING ROOM - DAY                        75 Ozim is dressing frantically, his face suddenly betraying his real anxiety. He checks his watch as he puts it back on his wrist. After a moment the two Chechen brothers who killed Ekrem enter the changing room. They swagger up to Ozim. (CONTINUED) PINK Revision    -   11/12/06                      83-83A. 75   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He gulps down his fear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kirill is in there. Ozim slaps his chest to denote the place where they will see the vor tattoo. They head towards the steam room as Ozim grabs his shoes and hurries towards the exit. 76   INT. TURKISH BATHS. STEAM ROOM - DAY                         76 Nikolai is sweating hard, staring at the ceiling. The steam room door opens but the steam is now so thick he can't see who has entered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ozim? He sees a shape... a clothed body. He realizes immediately. Suddenly one of the brothers is upon him and has him in a head lock. He strokes the tattoo on Nikolai's chest as if this were confirmation of who this is. He grunts an instruction and his brother emerges through the steam with an open razor. Nikolai is naked, alone. Suddenly he kicks the razor guy in the balls and uses a martial arts chop to free himself from the other brother. In the steam there are boots and bare feet and knees and fingers flying. Nikolai manages to gouge the eye of one brother and throw another against the wall. He obviously has serious combat training but the brothers are strong and angry. Suddenly Nikolai is slashed across the arm by the razor and blood oozes into the steam and hot water. All the men are slipping and falling on the blood and hot water. Another slash of the razor cuts his thigh open. All the men are now covered in blood and Nikolai, with a final surge of strength, manages to cripple one brother with a blow to the throat, and the other with an elbow to the temple. As the Chechens slump to the floor, Nikolai fumbles in the bloody water for the razor, finds it, kneels, and slashes their throats. He lurches to his feet, drops the razor, and staggers out of the steam room. 77   OMITTED                                                      77 GOLDENROD Revision     -   11/27/06                       84. 78   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. A AND E DEPARTMENT. CANTEEN - DAY      78 Aziz and a group of a dozen doctors and nurses are eating lunch, some in party hats, some drinking red wine out of paper cups. Aziz seems anxious, distracted. Anna enters in a hurry, locates Aziz and joins him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so late. Sorry. She looks around the 'party' with horror...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh God...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's fine, although I think I've had enough. He smiles and downs his glass of wine in one go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Paul, on my way here I made a decision.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't possibly dump me. We're not even going out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take my hand. Aziz, confused, takes her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Feel my pulse. Aziz feels Anna's pulse.      Anna takes a deep breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to apply to adopt Christine. A pause. (CONTINUED) BLUE Revision    -   11/4/06                               85. 78   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you feel that? Aziz smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I can. 79   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. A AND E DEPARTMENT - DAY                79 Nikolai is being hurried down the corridor, his face covered with an oxygen mask. He is covered with a surgical gown which is covered in blood. His arm flops out from under the covers as the paramedics rush him into the hospital. Anna is walking in the opposite direction. Then, as Nikolai's trolley passes, Anna sees Nikolai's arm, flopping from under the covers. She sees the eagle tattoo on the back of his hand. Anna freezes. 80   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. WARD. NIKOLAI'S ROOM - DAY              80 Nikolai is conscious in bed, attached to a single drip. His wounds have been stitched up. A doctor and two nurses are settling Nikolai's vital signs, moving around him, checking his temperature. Finally they clear the bed and through the glass of the room we see Anna, standing outside, staring in at Nikolai. 81   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. WARD. NIKOLAI'S ROOM - NIGHT            81 Nikolai is peering through half-opened eyes. The last nurse is checking his vital signs. Then Anna enters. The nurse stops work...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anna?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it OK to talk to him for a minute? The nurse hesitates...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's still in trauma.   Do you know him? Anna glances at Nikolai who is rousing himself. (CONTINUED) WHITE Revision      -   9/12/06                             86. 81   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. The nurse is reluctant but sees Anna's fierce stare and finally leaves. After she has gone Nikolai stirs, focuses on her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you did birth. Nikolai smiles, but Anna is trying hard to even out her fear and anger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My uncle.... Nikolai tries to sit up and registers pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...the one who spat in your face... He's disappeared. A pause. Nikolai gasps in pain as he raises himself up. Anna sees the wounds on his arms and glimpses the tattoos on his chest, scaring her even more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we don't hear from him soon we're going to the police... Nikolai reaches for a bottle of water and manages to take a swig. Anna is impatient for a reaction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know where he is? A pause. Nikolai finishes the bottle of water in one thirsty swig. Finally...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's in Scotland. In Edinburgh. In a five-star hotel. Anna is locating the door in case she has to flee as Nikolai swings his legs out of the bed to stretch his painful limbs. (CONTINUED) WHITE Revision    -   9/12/06                           87. 81   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edinburgh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to need some clothes. I arrived here without any. Can you get me some? Anna doesn't budge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't walk out of here naked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't walk out of here because you're attached to a drip. Explain Edinburgh. Nikolai sighs, sits back down on the bed.    He finally speaks softly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your uncle knew too much. Nikolai shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was told to get rid of him. I was meant to send him to heaven with a bullet in his head. Instead I sent him to Edinburgh. With a first-class ticket. A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is of the old school. He understood the situation. Exile or death. Edinburgh was his idea. He said they throw a great party at New Year. And he said it was a good excuse to get away from his family. Nikolai smiles at Anna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So... just a pair of jeans and a T- shirt. A jacket. And some shoes. Anna still looks disbelieving.   Nikolai sighs. (CONTINUED) GOLDENROD Revision   -   11/27/06                        88. 81   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hotel is called the Caledonian. Without a pause Anna leaves. 82   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. S.C.B.U. CHRISTINE'S PRIVATE ROOM -82 NIGHT Anna is sitting on the bed beside Christine's crib. Christine is asleep. Anna is speaking into her cell phone, trying to keep her voice down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...no, I couldn't get much sense out of him, he was drunk. A pause.   Anna looks exasperated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mum, I don't want to tell you how I found him because I don't want another argument. I just wanted you to know he's definitely safe... Anna listens with weariness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, we can't tonight. I'm working. I need the money. (a pause) For a place of my own, for Christ's sake! She listens with growing anger until she finally cuts the call without a word. Christine stirs but doesn't wake. She leans back against the wall, already regretful. 83   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL.    WARD OUTSIDE NIKOLAI'S ROOM -      83 NEXT MORNING. The ward is busy as Yuri, the police specialist from the Russian desk, enters wearing a heavy overcoat. He looks all around and approaches a nurse. PINK Revision    -   11/12/06                          89. 84   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. WARD. NIKOLAI'S ROOM - MORNING       84 Nikolai's drip is being removed by A NURSE. Nikolai is examining his healing wounds. Then through the glass of the door he notices Yuri, speaking to a nurse, and obviously recognizes him. The nurse points Yuri in Nikolai's direction. 85   EXT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. A FIRE ESCAPE LANDING - MORNING      85 It's cold and the wind is blowing. We see rooftops behind them. Yuri is lighting Nikolai's cigarette. Nikolai is wearing Yuri's overcoat loosely over his hospital gown. Yuri lights his own cigarette and they smoke in silence for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got my message? Yuri chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Using a dead body to file a progress report must be against FSB regulations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's called improvisation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've been improvising quite a lot lately. And taking risks. He glances at the cuts on Nikolai's hands...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in Russian) Maybe too many. Nikolai suddenly glares at Yuri.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in Russian) You didn't come here to give me flowers... Yuri shakes his head and prepares to deliver bad news. Nikolai turns as if to go back inside. Yuri grabs Nikolai's arm and speaks formally.... (CONTINUED) PINK Revision    -   11/12/06                              90. 85   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In light of what has happened to you... Nikolai shakes his head wearily....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, Christ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and in light of other violent incidents associated with you, the Russian desk at Scotland Yard have made an official request to the Russian embassy that your undercover operation in London be terminated. Nikolai doesn't react for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have gone beyond what was agreed. With his cigarette dangling from his mouth Nikolai begins to unbutton his overcoat..
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In my opinion you should see this as good news. You've been in the zone far too long... Nikolai turns and slowly pulls open the overcoat and the thin hospital gown beneath it. He reveals the eight-pointed star tattoos on his chest and Yuri reacts with absolute astonishment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My God...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If they terminate the operation now, they will be wasting this... A pause. Yuri looks shocked and slightly horrified. Nikolai too suddenly seems almost ashamed that he has got this far. After a long silence Nikolai mumbles. (CONTINUED) PINK Revision    -   11/12/06                           91. 85   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You tell the Russian desk you saw stars over my heart. OK? Tell them I'm through the door. A pause.   Yuri is still overwhelmed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They are bound to ask... who did you kill? A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell them I only killed myself. A pause. Yuri is humbled. They share a moment of understanding as they smoke. Finally...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you can tell them I'm going to replace Semyon at the head of the London organization. Yuri laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What drugs are they giving you? Maybe it's the anesthetic speaking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need you to take Semyon out of the picture. I want you to arrest him. Nikolai lights another cigarette from the stub of the one he is smoking. Yuri is incredulous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Arrest him for what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rape. Yuri begins to chuckle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The girl was fourteen. (CONTINUED) BLUE Revision    -   11/4/06                              92. 85   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And of course, she will testify...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She doesn't have to.   She's dead. A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But she had Semyon's baby. If you prove the baby is his and prove the girl was under age when the baby was conceived, that's statutory rape. A pause.   Yuri begins it think it through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All you need is the baby and some of Semyon's DNA. For poetic reasons I suggest you take his blood. Yuri peers at Nikolai with awe.    A long pause.   Finally Yuri smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You intrigue me. A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we had never had this conversation they would have sent you home. You could have spent the Spring in the mountains. Riding your bicycle to your office every morning through fields of flowers. A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why stay? Nikolai reacts but doesn't answer. A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You keep in touch. Yuri studies Nikolai. (CONTINUED) PINK Revision    -   11/12/06                             93. 85   CONTINUED: (4)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And take care, Mikhail. Yuri tenderly takes his overcoat from Nikolai's shoulders and goes back through the fire-escape door. Nikolai is left cold and exposed in his thin gown. 86   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. WARD. NIKOLAI'S ROOM - DAY             86 Nikolai is playing chess against himself, sitting on the bed, trying hard to concentrate. There is a knock and Anna enters, carrying an old shopping bag. She takes out a worn pair of jeans and a T-shirt, a denim jacket and a battered pair of shoes. Nikolai smiles...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How is Uncle Stepan? Instead of answering, Anna lays the clothes on the bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're from the morgue. They belonged to someone who died yesterday. Nikolai picks up the jeans and examines them.     They're way too big.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't believe I'm doing a favor for someone just because he had the decency not to murder a member of my family. Nikolai smiles but Anna turns to leave...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey... wait a minute... Nikolai steps behind the bed screen to pull on the jeans. He speaks from behind the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is your bike still working OK? A pause.   Anna considers leaving but hesitates.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.     It's OK. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you get in touch with Tatiana's family in Russia?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. Nikolai is now dressed, his cut and tattooed arms still showing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So the baby's still in England. A pause.   Anna nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's staying here for good. They peer at each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you care? Nikolai shrugs and grabs the shoes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stepan said you were kind to him. He said you were risking your own life to keep him alive. Nikolai laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, and all the thanks I get is a pair of dead man's shoes. (pause)                                         * I listen to you.                                    *
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you really?                                      *
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. About Semyon and the baby.                     * Thank you.                                          * (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (still wary)                                      * You thank me for that?                                * Their eyes lock across a huge divide.   He rubs the tattoos on his arm. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (indicating tattoos)                              * These things are just marks on the skin, you know? Anna nods. An awkward pause, then Anna turns and leaves quickly. 87   INT. TRANS-SIBERIAN RESTAURANT - DAY                         87 The restaurant is filled with balloons of every color, all over the floor and bouncing off the tables. A large `Happy New Year' banner is hanging from the wall. Kirill is sitting on the floor amongst the balloons, blowing up another one. Maria, Semyon's little granddaughter, runs in to the restaurant and stops to stare at Kirill. He begins to inflate another balloon then stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in Russian) What are you looking at?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You. Maria comes to him and take a balloon. She tries to blow it up but fails. Kirill smiles and blows it up for her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What were you and Grandpa shouting about last night?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing, baby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It sounded like something. Kirill takes a deep breath to blow a balloon then stops and looks at Maria.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone I know got hurt and I blamed Grandpa.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you fight each other?    I heard banging. (CONTINUED) PINK Revision    -    11/12/06                            96. 87   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. It's not a fight if one of you doesn't fight back. A pause.     Kirill smiles.   We see slight abrasions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, today I do as I am told. She nods and Kirill blows another balloon. At that moment Kirill sees on the security monitor behind the bar that a police car is pulling up outside the restaurant. His face clouds as another pulls up beside it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maria.   Go upstairs. 88   INT. TRANS-SIBERIAN RESTAURANT - DAY                            88 Semyon sits at a bare table, opposite Yuri from the Russian desk. A uniformed officer stands nearby, and there is a police doctor with a medical bag sitting at the next table, waiting. The whole scene is rendered surreal by all the balloons which bounce around them. Semyon is in full charming old man mode.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll have a drink, Yuri... He is half on his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't drink on duty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sometimes I don't believe you are really Russian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've told you, I am half Russian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then have half a drink. Yuri shakes his head.     Semyon goes to the optic and helps himself to a vodka. (CONTINUED) WHITE Revision       -    9/12/06                     97. 88   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what is all this nonsense?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We just need a blood sample.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can take the sample right now voluntarily or I can get an order from the court. It's up to you. Semyon glances at the doctor and chuckles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He sits there like a vampire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What, you are afraid of needles, Semyon? Semyon's face hardens and he glares at Yuri.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am afraid of... conspiracies. A pause.     Yuri speaks softly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will return tomorrow with a court order. He gets to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait.       I've done nothing wrong. Semyon begins to roll up his sleeve, revealing a long scroll of tattoos. Then a needle is being pushed into Semyon's arm by the doctor. Semyon's face doesn't flicker. He stares into Yuri's eyes. BLUE Revision   -   11/4/06                                98. 89   INT. TRANS-SIBERIAN RESTAURANT. KITCHEN - DAY                    89 Kirill is preparing food for the night's festivities. Semyon enters and goes straight to the sink. He pulls off the plaster from his arm where the blood was taken and pours some vodka over the tiny puncture hole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did they want with you, papa?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To poison me. Semyon pours more vodka on the wound then takes a swig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They took blood from me with a needle. Probably the same needle they use for all the junkies and whores and blacks and queers. He glares at Kirill as he rolls his sleeve down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now I probably have the fucking queer disease. Kirill has his back turned, doesn't react.   Semyon sits heavily. Finally...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would they want your blood, papa? For the first time Semyon looks vulnerable and confused as he admits....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. Kirill is surprised to see his father unsure.   He peers at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone is ahead of me. I don't like people ahead of me. Kirill is now unnerved by Semyon's quiet confusion. He watches as Semyon grabs at the bottle of vodka to drink. He speaks softly as he swigs. (CONTINUED) BLUE Revision       -   11/4/06                         99. 89   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (softly) What the hell did that cocksucker want with my blood? Kirill is reluctant to speak at first but eventually chances his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe it's about the baby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What baby? A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some bitch was out there saying you were the father of a baby. Semyon turns to Kirill, his face hardening...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talking about? Semyon approaches and Kirill gets scared.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was nothing. Just some bitch...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The woman from the hospital.   The midwife. Semyon stares into Kirill's eyes and Kirill mistakes his frantic thought process for anger. Kirill backs away. Semyon is beginning to catch up. 90   EXT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL - NIGHT                               90 The main entrance of the hospital is busy with visitors and staff. There is a `Happy New Year' banner across the entrance. In amongst the bustle of visitors we spy a young man with his collar turned up and a bunch of red roses in his hand. We then see that it is Kirill, entering the hospital. GOLDENROD Revision   -   11/27/06                      100. 91   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. CORRIDOR - NIGHT                     91 Anna is walking down a corridor with her crash helmet in her hand, heading for another shift. 92   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. ELEVATORS - NIGHT                    92 We are close on Kirill's face as he studies a map of the hospital near the elevators. Anna comes down a stairwell and spots Kirill - she especially notices the roses - just as he gets into an elevator. The elevator doors close. Was it really him? Anna is not sure. She frowns. 93   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. EMPTY CORRIDOR - NIGHT               93 A door opens and Kirill steps into striped moonlight. Clamping the roses under his arm, he pulls a black zip-up sports bag from under his coat. After a brief dialogue with himself, he produces a half bottle of vodka and takes a swig. Then he hurries on. 94   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. S.C.B.U. CHRISTINE'S PRIVATE ROOM -94 NIGHT Anna walks onto the ward in her uniform. She checks a few stats as she walks by various beds. She then glances over at Christine's private room. She tiptoes into the room and goes to the crib. She finds it empty - except for a bunch of red roses. Outside the ward is now filling up with visitors. Babies cry, people laugh. Anna goes back out to the ward and calls to a nurse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sonya! Is someone bathing Christine?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.   She's in her cot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (calmly) Well she's not. She's not. PINK Revision   -   11/12/06                          101. 95   OMITTED                                                      95 96   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. CORRIDOR - NIGHT                    96 Anna runs at breakneck speed through the corridors. 97   EXT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. CAR PARK - NIGHT                    97 Kirill is at the wheel of Nikolai's Mercedes. He swigs from his bottle of vodka, which is now more than half empty. He fires the engine and reverses. A car passing by has to slam on its brakes. Kirill yells.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, you stupid fucker!! A horn blows. The passing car accelerates angrily by. Then we hear a baby crying. Kirill looks into the half darkness of the back seat and we see Kirill's black sports bag, partially zipped up. Christine is crying inside it, her little grasping hand protruding past the zipper. Kirill speaks softly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be quiet baby. Quiet baby.    It's
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Nikolai steps out from behind the screen, the baggy jeans tightly belted, his chest bare. For the first time Anna sees the extent of Nikolai's body tattoos and reacts.... Nikolai sees her reaction to the tattoos and doesn't care for it. He grabs the T-shirt and pulls it on.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . PINK Revision     -   11/12/06                         102. 98   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. WARD OUTSIDE NIKOLAI'S ROOM -        98 NIGHT Anna flies out of Nikolai's room and spots a nurse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to the patient with the knife cuts? The Russian?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We just discharged him.   A couple of minutes ago. Anna runs out. 99   INT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. RECEPTION - NIGHT                    99 Anna runs fast down the corridor towards the hospital exit. She spots Nikolai ahead of her. She pushes past a couple of drunks and flies at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where have they taken Christine?! Nikolai reacts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You bastards!! Where will he take her?! Tell me!! People back away as Nikolai grabs Anna's arms and holds her still.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you talking about?! Anna studies Nikolai's face and sees his genuine confusion. She calms down a little.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kirill. Kirill has taken Christine. I saw him here! I thought he was coming to see you, but he wasn't, was he? Nikolai curses under his breath and thinks fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You brought your bike? BLUE Revision   -   11/4/06                            103. 100    EXT. NINE ELMS. ABANDONED DOCK - NIGHT                        100 The same dockside where Nikolai dumped Soyka and recommended this as the best place to dispose of a body. Kirill pulls up slowly in Nikolai's Mercedes. The car is parked for a long time before finally the headlights are switched off. 101    EXT. TRAFALGAR HOSPITAL. MATERNITY UNIT - NIGHT               101 Nikolai and Anna race to Anna's motorbike.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll drive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll drive. Anna and Nikolai leap aboard the bike and it starts first time. With Nikolai riding pillion, they roar away. 101A   EXT. LONDON STREET - NIGHT                                    101A Anna and Nikolai ride through London streets. 102    EXT. NINE ELMS. ABANDONED DOCK - NIGHT                        102 On the edge of the dockside, Kirill is kneeling with the zip-up bag before him. Suddenly fireworks begin to burst over the Thames. It is the stroke of midnight. Kirill unzips the bag. When he looks inside Christine stops crying. He peers at her, wiping away tears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's a little girl, Papa, a little sweet fucking girl... Kirill sobs then Christine cries...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shush, shush... Kirill lifts her out of the bag and holds her close to him, fireworks still illuminating the London skyline. He looks down at the freezing cold water, utterly confused. He whispers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, my little sister. (CONTINUED) BLUE Revision   -   11/4/06                           103A. 102   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For a moment we believe he is going to throw her into the water. Instead he begins to sing a lullaby to her and her crying stops. (CONTINUED) PINK Revision    -   11/12/06                            104. 102   CONTINUED: (2)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then we see a single light behind him. In a firework flash we see Nikolai and Anna climbing off the bike. They approach cautiously. Kirill stares at the man he loves. A pause. Christine begins to cry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kirill, let me take the baby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You stay where you are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's cold, Kirill. Kirill suddenly screams as another barrage of fireworks explodes. Nikolai doesn't move. Kirill is dangerously close to the edge of the dock. Maybe he'll throw himself in too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kirill, a vor doesn't kill little babies. Kirill is motionless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something like this would be bad for all of us. Your dad has gone too far, Kirill. A pause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's our turn now. Nikolai steps forward slowly.    As he gets closer Kirill hugs the baby. Finally Nikolai reaches Kirill and hugs him. As he does he edges him away from the dockside. The three of them are locked in a long embrace. Nikolai emerges from the embrace with Christine in his arms. He quickly hands her to Anna who hugs her close. Kirill turns to Nikolai.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I swear I didn't know my dad was setting you up. (CONTINUED) YELLOW Revision    -   11/21/06                           105. 102   CONTINUED: (3)
direction.name: direction
